title: Gosh im so glad i can dumbster this Game in 3months
body:
https://imgur.com/a/f5kiEWb

Basically getting insulted and getting made fun of for being "new".

Great Game Riot, thats the best way to get new Players, just rush at them with the Insults

replies.body: lol how does one shit-bag on the internet mean riot did something wrong? Have you ever been on reddit or 4chan? have you ever posted a youtube video?
Damnit its all riots fault that someone flamed you
wah wah idk how to use the mute button wah ppl are mean
He's new so its likely he didn't know where to find it.
hes lvl 46 if he doesn't know how to mute I think we have a bigger problem.
